website: Dr. Alicia Harbison, DO, Pantego, TX | Family Physician

reviews.name: Gloria P.
reviews.description: I had technical difficulty with my video cam but she called me and still had the appointment which was very convenient.

reviews.name: Todd N.
reviews.description: Paragon of providers. She is prompt, attentive, responsive, respectful, warm and professional. I highly recommend.

reviews.name: Catherine S.
reviews.description: I did a virtual appointment with Dr. Harbison and it was great. I managed to get my medications prescribed and refilled :)

reviews.name: Victoria W.
reviews.description: My first video visit with Dr Harrison was great. She took time to listen and ask questions. Great first impression!

reviews.name: Tayna G.
reviews.description: The doctor is very friendly. I felt instantly comfortable in sharing my problems and concern.

reviews.name: Alison M.
reviews.description: Very pleased with service doctor is very knowledgeable and  answered all my question without rushing me out the office.

reviews.name: Amanda Y.
reviews.description: She is absolutely amazing! Very professional, funny and knowledge. Very thorough with her appointments. Love her energy.

reviews.name: Kamisha A.
reviews.description: It would have been fine if I didn't have to pay to see the doctor and I have insurance

reviews.name: MM
reviews.description: Dr. Harbison was amazing! She listened with empathy and was extremely thorough. I am ecstatic about my new doctor!

reviews.name: Blaine J.
reviews.description: Dr. Alicia was very nice, helped me feel at ease and addressed of my concerns and even helped me with a referral

reviews.name: Stacy F.
reviews.description: I was very pleased with Dr Harbison.She took her time and listened to me without rushing.. very nice  person.

reviews.name: Vanessa P.
reviews.description: She was extremely patient and answered all the questions i had. Very kind!

reviews.name: Lixin A.
reviews.description: Dr. Harbison is a detail oriented and a very nice person to visit as a doctor.

reviews.name: Anessa R.
reviews.description: She was very kind and professional! Made me feel comfortable during my visit.

reviews.name: Skylar S.
reviews.description: Awesome doctor! Made me feel very comfortable and actually cares about what is wrong with me.

reviews.name: Bobbie Jo B.
reviews.description: Dr. Harbison was personal and very professional!! She answered all questions and more!!!

reviews.name: Trina M.
reviews.description: She was very blunt and nice. She made me very comfortable and I look forward to seeing her again.

reviews.name: Tam H.
reviews.description: Very professional and pleasant. She made me feel very comfortable. Would recommend to everyone.

reviews.name: Elaina D.
reviews.description: Listened to my issues as a friend and a doctor! Got me what I needed quickly and efficiently!

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: She is very passionate about what she does! Supper informative! She made me feel comfortable.

reviews.name: Sebastian H.
reviews.description: She was very clear with all the answer and friendly! Love to see her agin.

reviews.name: Lisa H.
reviews.description: Very good! She made me feel comfortable and  she reassured me every step of the way.

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: Do not recommend, say they take insurance but still require to pay for insurance cost up front.

reviews.name: Danny D.
reviews.description: Personable, reasonable, listened to my concerns and considered them seriously.

reviews.name: Delisha C.
reviews.description: She is very good at her job. Any anxiety you have she will put you at ease.

reviews.name: AC
reviews.description: Dr. Harbison is very friendly and polite to all her patients, and does her best for each patient.

reviews.name: Virginia B.
reviews.description: Very professional. I felt listened to and I was very impressed.

reviews.name: Leslie T.
reviews.description: Great, she makes you very comfortable right away and provides lots of good information.

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: Great doctor, made for a very nice visit -- thank you!

reviews.name: Todd N.
reviews.description: Exceptional. Engaged, warm, professional provider, whom I highly recommend.

reviews.name: Brittany E.
reviews.description: She was super helpful and sweet. I will definitely see her again in the future.

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: She has a sense of humor. Funny. I appreciate that the older I get.

reviews.name: Sen S.
reviews.description: Extremely nice, personable, smart, helpful and professional.

reviews.name: Amanda Y.
reviews.description: She is always so amazing! I love going to see her and her wonderful staff.

reviews.name: Curtis B.
reviews.description: She is extremely intensive and does not watch the clock like all other doctors

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: I found the doctor to be very proficient in her way of visit

reviews.name: Heather C.
reviews.description: She’s extremely personable and pleasant to talk to.

reviews.name: OZ
reviews.description: Fast and good. The Dr. was goofy but she helped me with what I came in for.

reviews.name: Shawna M.
reviews.description: First time seeing her. She was awesome I would definitely recommend .

reviews.name: Florenica N.
reviews.description: I absolutely love this doctor. Even tho she’s a 30 minute drive away!

reviews.name: Amanda F.
reviews.description: She's really awesome!.. she made me feel comfortable.

reviews.name: Kevin B.
reviews.description: Good doctor she actually listens to you. Fast no wait time.

reviews.name: Initials hidden
reviews.description: She is very nice and I’m glad to have found a PCP who cares.

reviews.name: Shanita P.
reviews.description: Visit went well.

reviews.name: Frankie O.
reviews.description: There was a 45 minute wait to see the Dr even with  no one else wairing.  However, this was not the Drs fault.  Office staff was trying to verify coverage and the insurance company put them on hold and  never came. back.  Once we got around them everything went smoothly.  She tried to save me as much money as possible, which is a big plus in my book.

reviews.name: Martin G.
reviews.description: Dr Harbison is fantastic! She helped out with everything I needed today. My only issue was that is was a bit of a wait but the care more than made up for it!

reviews.name: Heather E.
reviews.description: The staff was wonderful and Dr Harbison was very sweet, kind, helpful, a great listener and I would highly recommend to my friends!!

reviews.name: James R.
reviews.description: The most unhelpful and unkind experience in some time...and I am 60 years old. Your front girls only chat and joke with each other and tell me I need  to have a seat and try on my phone to find my insurance card number

reviews.name: Don E N.
reviews.description: The visit was great! Alicia was extremely patient, helpful and explained everything.  She smiled and listened. I felt she genuinely cares about my well being. From now on she will be my personal care physician!

reviews.name: Zelda H.
reviews.description: I would definitely recommend her, but the receptionist that attend this was very rude disrespectful, and canceled our appointment. She kept screaming at us. I really do not appreciate her attitude. The doctor herself is very nice she listens to you she is very professional and most of her staff is very respectful except for this one person. As soon as you call me and I picked up the phone she was screaming at me and I did not appreciate that at all. show more
